Package net.demilich.metastone.game.cards

Interface CardList

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Collection<Card>, java.lang.Iterable<Card>, java.util.List<Card>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CardArrayList, CardZone
    public interface CardList
extends java.lang.Iterable<Card>, java.util.List<Card>, java.io.Serializable
    An interface describing common actions for a collection of cards. This abstracts away the difference between an EntityZone, which enforces that its containing Entity objects can only be in one EntityZone at a time, versus a plain CardArrayList, which is just an array of cards that various pieces of logic might want to addCard(Card) to.

    Use CardZone for the Zones.HAND, Zones.DECK and Zones.DISCOVER zones--when a card should only be in one place at a time. Use a CardArrayList for situations where you need to e.g., get a list of cards from an EntityFilter, shuffle them, and choose one from the top.

    See Also:
    for the entity zone that implements this interface., for a implementation of this interface.

        default Card peek()
        Returns the last card in the card list. This is the top of the deck.
